
//mistake i did
//clarity in logic
//range of inputs
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long multi2[32];
long seqsearch(long n) {
	for(int i=0;i<32;i++){
		if(n<multi2[i]){
			return multi2[i-1];
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

int main() {

	long n = 1;
	multi2[0] = 1;
	int t;
	int l=0;
	while (n < 1000000001) {
		n = n * 2;
		multi2[l] = n;
		l++;
	}
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {

		cin >> n;
		cout<<seqsearch(n)<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
